price: Msiyayatike leo! Hakika nyinyi hamtanusurika nasi.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
footnotes: Basi tunawaambia: Msiyayatike, wala msiombe msaada hivi sasa. Hamtatoka ndani ya adhabu yangu, wala kuyayatika kwenu hakufai kitu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
